data.detailed_description:
"Alice | æ„›è‰æ¾„" is a survival horror set in a Japanese construction site.
Aim to escape from the construction site while escaping from the urban legendary woman.

"The full version of "Alice | æ„›è‰æ¾„" is now available on Steam !!"

â– Additional elements

Increased volume from "Alice | æ„›è‰æ¾„ã€DEMOã€‘".
Addition of save function and adjustment around UI make it easier to play.

â– Synopsis


--2015, Tokyo.

There, an urban legend was prevalent about a woman.

Rumors of a ghost of a mistress called "Alice".

Everyone was on the topic, but I didn't mind.

That day was late at the university club drinking party,

I couldn't make it in time for the last train, so I had no choice but to go home on foot.

On my way home, when I came near a pitch-black construction site, I decided to take a shortcut,

I decided to go through the camera I had just in one hand.

However, there I came across something that didn't seem to belong to this world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5 8th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 4800H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
